ygData.subject: Where to go...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi guys! I m real close to lvl 24 now and I m wondering where I should be fighting. I m loving permafrost, but I want to move on soon.  (Don t even say
ygData.messageBody:
Hi guys!

I'm real close to lvl 24 now and I'm wondering where I should be fighting.
I'm loving permafrost, but I want to move on soon. (Don't even say
Highkeep, I hate that place.. :) ). I checked out Sol A, but there
weren't enough people there at the time that could group with me (mostly
lvl 35 and up). the mobs there looked great, and I found a couple nice
places to set up camp, but it might be tough to get a group going in that
situation. Any other suggestions? I'm really loving the dungeon scene.
big pulls, mez, and tons of exp and good loot. Anybody have any favorite
dungeons that would be good for my level? :)

Thanks!
Ezrae Dreamstealer
Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis
